description: Adds metadata tags to an Amazon DocumentDB resource. You can use these tags with cost allocation reporting to track costs that are associated with Amazon DocumentDB resources or in a Condition statement in an Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for Amazon DocumentDB.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The Amazon DocumentDB resource that the tags are added to. This value is an Amazon Resource Name .

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the Amazon DocumentDB resource. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon DocumentDB resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). Value (string) --- The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').
